original_text: and they brought up the ark and the tent of meeting and all the sacred furnishings in it. The Levitical priests carried them up;
korean_text: 궤와 회막과 장막 안에 모든 거룩한 기구를 메고 올라가되 레위인 제사장들이 그것들을 메고 올라가매

sentences.original_text: and they brought up the ark
and all the sacred furnishings in it
The Levitical priests carried them up
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람 제사장들이 그것들을 메고 올라갔더라
